info.brief_description: Jd or one of the characters from scrubs shrinks down and faces a lot of problems.
info.description:
Can't believe that this story has reached 15k views thanks everyone :)

The story line is basically is one of the characters off Scrubs shrinks down to insect size. A few inches tall (1-3inches).

For each added chapter, you will receive 100GPs

And that's it really.

P.S Get involved!
